casebody.data:
In re TOBACCOVILLE USA, INC. No. 49P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. February 7, 2008. Jason T. Strickland, New Bern, for Tobaccoville & Phillips. Kathleen Barry, Assistant Attorney General, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th day of February 2008 by Respondent (Tobaccoville & Phillips) for Temporary Stay:

*3"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 7th day of February 2008."
